ValidationRule.description: Ensures academic status aligns with current GPA performance
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISPICKVAL(Academic_Status__c, "Active"), Current_GPA__c < 1.5), AND(ISPICKVAL(Academic_Status__c, "Academic Probation"), OR(Current_GPA__c >= 2.5, Current_GPA__c < 1.0)), AND(ISPICKVAL(Academic_Status__c, "Academic Suspension"), Current_GPA__c >= 2.0) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Academic status does not match GPA requirements. Students with GPA below 1.5 should be suspended, 1.5-2.5 on probation.
